2DPolyBase.h File Reference

Base class template for a 2D shape. Requires some sort of line class with the relevant functions. More...

#include "2DLineBaseSet.h"

Classes

class  C2DPolyBase
 A class which forms the basis of a 2 dimensional area or shape such as a polygon. Contains a closed set of lines of some sort, based on the abstract class C2DLineBase. Lines can be of mixed type. More...

Detailed Description

Base class template for a 2D shape. Requires some sort of line class with the relevant functions.
